<color=Highlight>[Resonance Liberation]</color>

- Casting Heavy Attack - Thunderoar: Uppercut, Heavy Attack - Thunderoar: Backstep, Burst Slash, and Eclipse additionally restores <color=Highlight>{7}</color> points of Resonance Energy and grants <color=Highlight>{8}</color> DMG Bonus for <color=Highlight>{10}s</color>, stacking up to <color=Highlight>{9}</color> times.
